*Wrath stared confused and Kamodia smiled and waved back* Wrath: Well, What=
 should we do first? Any missions that done? Kamodia: Any other bots I can =
meet? *Kamodia said hoping Dracona said yes*
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 =
6:39 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "now that your with us, understan=
d that we don't fight Maximals, we only fight Alliance and sometimes the Pr=
edacons, we're in this to end this war...." Dracona pointed out.. "i'm Drac=
ona, that's Plintissa, she's talking to the core consiousness of Suukie, an=
d those are the Radicons, Stranato, Arrow, Stronghold, Airbomber, Scamrock,=
 and Train Wreck...." Dracona pointed out....The Radicons stopped stranglin=
g each other and waved to Wrath and Kamodia......
    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: T=
uesday, May 30, 2000 6:27 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Wrath K=
amodia payed very much attention to everything Dracona showed them*
      -=
---- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
      Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:21 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast=
 Wars


      Dracona smiled... "great, we needed members..the radicons loo=
ked at each other angily....with one punch Scamrock knocked down Arrow, but=
 dracona stopped the fight quickly......Dracona pointed out the secrets of =
the base to Wrath and Kamodia, like the secret passagewaay and stuff.....
 =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
       =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:15 PM
      =
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        *Wrath and Kamodia begin walking ar=
ound looking at all the CR Chamber's and Computer's* Kamodia: Well, I seem =
to like it. Wrath: It didn't take us too long to get in here. *They both tu=
rned to Dracona* Kamodia: I wish to join. Wrath: Count me in for that.
    =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 5:30 PM
         =
 Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "yes, you can join us, the People'=
s Group!..." Dracona said..... "come on, we'll show you, but promise not to=
 ever let this slip out......" Dracona said.....Dracona put a blindfold on =
Wrath and Kamodia and (with Orchid's permission only, if Orchid doesn't lik=
e this then it doesn't have to happen, just wanted to quicken things...) to=
ok them through the secret passageway..... "thiss is the base....it's all u=
nderground...." Dracona said, removing the blindfolds from Wrath and Kamodi=
a.....
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: iloveall=
lizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, May=
 30, 2000 3:36 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            *Wr=
ath and Kamodia turned to look* Wrath: Do you know where we can get a job? =
*Wrath asked to Dracona* *Wrath said as he and Kamodia walked up to Dracona=
* *Kamodia smiled as she got her wish of meeting some more bots*
          =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
            =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:24 AM=

              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              Dracona and comp=
any finishe repairing all except for suukie, wgo was injured too bad and wo=
uld take a long time to repair..Plintissa, much to Dracona's anger, had for=
gotten about their mission and stayed to talk to Suukie....the Radicons and=
 Dracona came from the secret passage way when nobody could possibly see, a=
nd walked off searching for some members......the Radicons bickered among t=
hemselves and Dracona studied the landscape..Dracona saw Wrath and Kamodia.=
. "hey, you 2, over here!..." Dracona said, calling out Wrath and Kamodia..=
....the Radicons drew their blasters and stood guard, Scamrock laughed and =
played with his thumbs......Dracona showed her hands empty to show that she=
 came in peace....she waved to Wrath and Kamodia.....
                -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
           =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 9:1=
2 PM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                *Kamodia=
 thought she saw something for a minute but figures its all in her mond con=
tinues walking on*
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
          From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        =
          Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 6:43 AM
                  Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


                  Plintissa looks in the distance and spo=
ts Wrath and Kamodia....Plintissa knows the would be good for the People's =
Group, but no wway she could invite them with these idiot Truths surroundin=
g her!......she ushers to Wrath and Kamodia, hoping they'll see......
     =
               ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: ilov=
ealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  =
  Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 2:15 AM
                    Subject: Neo Beast=
 Wars


                    *Wrath and Kamodia still stand on the outside o=
f the Maximal base* Wrath: HEEEEYYYY!! WE WANT A JOB!!! *Wrath yells at the=
 top of his lungs* *Than he notices Kamodia walking away* Wrath: Where are =
you going? Kamodia: I'm not sticking around here when they don't want us. W=
rath: How do you know that they don't? Kamodia: If they really wanted us th=
an they'd answer us. *Kamodia turns and walks on looking for another base* =
*Wrath stands there thinking about what Komodia said and comes to the fact =
that she's right* Wrath: Hey wait up! *Wrath comes running up and catches u=
p with Kamodia* Kamodia: What made you leave? *She says giving off a sly gr=
in* Wrath: I came to the fact that I'm too good for that dump. Kamodia: Com=
e on, admit it! I'm right. If they really wanted us then they would've answ=
ered us. *Wrath doesn't answer and keeps looking foward* Kamodia: Your just=
 mad because you know I'm right but you are right about that place being a =
dump. *They contiue walking on*
